snippet: Schemes targeting old people were recently reported to the police in Forest Hills, Queens, including one in which a woman, 82, was told her grandson needed $3,500 for bail.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column notes spike in criminal schemes targeting elderly in Forest Hills, Queens, where demographic is in relative abundance.
